commitResults.messageTitle: Implement a skeletal version of Areus.
commitResults.messageBody: Greets the user and exits with Areus.java

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement the Echo feature for the skeletal version of Aerus
commitResults.messageBody:
Repeat user input, and exit when the user types "bye".
Rename variable "hline" to "dividerLine".

commitResults.messageTitle: Add a list of inputs to display when requested
commitResults.messageBody:
Aerus can keep track of user inputs (up to 100 items).
Implement printContent() function to facilitate printing one-liners.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add the ability to mark as done
commitResults.messageBody:
User can mark or unmark tasks as done.
Add Task class to represent tasks.
Employ minor changes to follow the Coding Standard.
Refactor code to increase code quality

commitResults.messageTitle: Make great changes to the structure of the project
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added Deadline/Event/ToDo features and their corresponding classes.
- UI and User Input are now handled by separate classes.
